thread.title: Bianco
thread.title_full: The Official ECCO Shop recenserad av Bianco

author: Bianco
title: Bianco
text: Shoes as always of the highest quality and comfort. What's more is the excellent customer service. Purchased the product at a 40% discount and when the price has dropped by another 10%, they have, without any fuss (just one short email), refunded the difference! You cannot go wrong with ECCO shoes and their official online shop!
